actions.committee: Committee on Appropriations pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975, as modified by the order of April 11, 1986, with instructions that the Budget Committee be authorized to report its views to the Appropriations Commmittee, and that the latter alone be authorized to report the bill
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975, as modified by the order of April 11, 1986, with instructions that the Budget Committee be authorized to report its views to the Appropriations Commmittee, and that the latter alone be authorized to report the bill.

actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975, as modified by the order of April 11, 1986, with instructions that the Budget Committee be authorized to report its views to the Appropriations Commmittee, and that the latter alone be authorized to report the bill.

official_title: A bill to approve the President's rescission proposals submitted to the Congress on April 9, 1992.

summary.text: Rescinds certain budget authority proposed to be rescinded (R92-123) (National Guard and Reserve equipment) in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on April 9, 1992, in accordance with the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act of of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to approve the President's rescission proposals submitted to the Congress on April 9, 1992.
